post.title: canceling one line in family plan that includes add a line for $7.99
post.content: currently i have 4 lines in my family plan. line 1 + 2 are from the start line 3 - added for $7.99 line 4 - added for $9.99 if i were to cancel line #2, then i would have 3 lines. would line #3 be $7.99 or $9.99? i would like it to be $7.99.
